CustomField.formula:
IF( ((PDC_Trailer_A_Attached__c = true) && (PDC_Trailer_A_Air_lines__c = false || PDC_Trailer_A_Tyre_condition__c = false || PDC_Trailer_A_Wheel_nut__c = false || PDC_Trailer_A_Leg_secure__c = false || PDC_Trailer_A_Load_restraint__c = false || PDC_Trailer_A_Gates__c = false || PDC_Trailer_A_Curtains_doors__c = false || PDC_Trailer_A_Free_of_oil_leaks__c = false || PDC_Trailer_A_suspension__c = false || PDC_Trailer_A_All_lights__c = false || PDC_Trailer_A_Check_brake__c = false || PDC_Trailer_A_Rego_label__c = false))
|| ((PDC_Trailer_B_Attached__c = true) && (PDC_Trailer_B_Air_lines__c = false || PDC_Trailer_B_Tyre_condition__c = false || PDC_Trailer_B_Wheel_nut__c = false || PDC_Trailer_B_Leg_secure__c = false || PDC_Trailer_B_Load_restraint__c = false || PDC_Trailer_B_Gates__c = false || PDC_Trailer_B_Curtains_doors__c = false || PDC_Trailer_B_Free_of_oil_leaks__c = false || PDC_Trailer_B_Turntable__c = false || PDC_Trailer_B_suspension__c = false || PDC_Trailer_B_All_lights__c = false || PDC_Trailer_B_Check_brake__c = false || PDC_Trailer_B_Rego_label__c = false))
, "Failed", "Passed")
CustomField.label: Is Roadworthy?
